answer: On each Credential stored in “My Achievements”, there is a three dots button (…) that allows you to view and share the URL of your digital credential. Besides you can also download the PDF certificate 🖥
answer_formatted: On each Credential stored in “My Achievements”, there is a three dots button (…) that allows you to view and share the URL of your digital credential. Besides you can also download the PDF certificate 🖥
question: Is there a way for me to share my credential?
